actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the City of Grand Junction, Colorado for airport purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation, subject to specified conditions, to grant releases from certain restrictions on property conveyed by the United States to the city of Grand Junction, Colorado, for airport purposes.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the City of Grand Junction, Colorado for airport purposes.
